citations.narrative:
Complete records for exhibit animals on hand were not available at the time of inspection. Required records must be
maintained to allow inspection personnel to ensure proper tracking of animals or determine that the program of veterinary
care is being followed for each animal. The facility must ensure records required by the Animal Welfare Act are
maintained and available for inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
SCOTT WELCH, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Complete records for exhibit animals on hand were not available at the time of inspection.  Required records must be 
maintained to allow inspection personnel to ensure proper tracking of animals or determine that the program of veterinary 
care is being followed for each animal.  The facility must ensure records required by the Animal Welfare Act are 
maintained and available for inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
SCOTT WELCH, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
